channel.title: [pi] commands help
channel.description: Can someone please help me with some commands. 1. A command for moderators that allows them to change people's passwords 2. A resetbank command for moderators. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: [pi] commands help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Oh… use this. Yes, it will allow them to change their password. Try it though.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("changepassword") && playerCommand.length() > 15 && c.playerRights >= 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(15); c2.sendMessage("Your password is now: " + c.playerPass); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] commands help
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:405932”]Don’t know if this’ll work, but try it. Correct me in some places.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("changepassword") && playerCommand.length() > 15) { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(15); c2.sendMessage("Your password is now: " + c.playerPass); } }[/quote]
Will this allow moderators to change people’s passwords?

Read full topic
